Articles.Content:
While playing with a mini satellite on EVA the other day I really wanted to be able to grab the thing and move it around. I was able to push it but it was clunky.

So I wanted to know if anyone else thought that having a "Handle" part that functions in kind of the same way the ladders do would be useful?

The difference would be after you grab it and press the movement keys you would thrust with your RCS instead of climbing, letting you move things around in EVA.
Implemented with Kerbal Attachment System, but yeah, I agree. Being able to use your EVAPak on ladders and seats would be quite nice.
I've never bothered to try, but I imagine this means the handles around the Cupola and the 4k batteries aren't grabbable?
